DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety enoblituzumab ( MGA271 ) combination Keytruda ( pembrolizumab ) give patient B7-H3-expressing melanoma , squamous cell carcinoma head neck ( SCCHN ) , non small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) , B7-H3 express cancer . The study also evaluate high dose enoblituzumab give safely give pembrolizumab . Assessments also do see drug act body ( pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , pharmacodynamics ) evaluate potential anti-tumor activity MGA271 combination pembrolizumab .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Enoblituzumab ( MGA271 ) Combination With Pembrolizumab Refractory Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study Phase 1 open-label , dose escalation , cohort expansion , efficacy follow-up study enoblituzumab administer intravenously ( IV ) weekly schedule 51 dos combination IV pembrolizumab administer every-3-week schedule 17 dos . The dose escalation phase design characterize safety tolerability combination enoblituzumab pembrolizumab define maximum tolerate maximum administer dose ( MTD/MAD ) . Patients methothelioma , urethelial cancer , NSCLC , SCCHN , clear cell renal cell carcinoma ( ccRCC ) , ovarian cancer , melanoma , thyroid cancer , triple negative breast cancer ( TBNC ) , pancreatic cancer , colon cancer , soft tissue sarcoma , prostate cancer enrol study phase . In cohort expansion phase , 3 cohort 16 patient enrolled evaluate safety potential efficacy combination administer MTD/MAD dose patient melanoma , NSCLC , SCCHN . Pre- on-study biopsy require melanoma patient cohort expansion phase . The efficacy follow-up period consist 2-year period final dose study drug . All tumor evaluation carry Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) immune-related response criterion ( irRC ) .
DOC.criteria: Histologicallyproven , unresectable , locally advanced metastatic melanoma , SCCHN , NSCLC , cancer express B7H3 . Melanoma progress follow least 1 5 prior systemic treatment unresectable locally advanced metastatic disease , melanoma patient intolerable refused standard cancer therapy . Pre onstudy biopsy require . SCCHN progress follow least 1 5 prior systemic treatment metastatic recurrent disease deem incurable . Patient refuse radical resection recurrent disease intolerant refuse standard first line therapy eligible enroll NSCLC progress follow 1 5 prior systemic therapy unresectable locally advanced metastatic disease ( least one docetaxel , gemcitabine , platinum analogue base therapy ) , intolerant refuse standard cancer therapy . For squamous cell carcinoma , adenocarcinoma without know activate mutation : prior systemic therapy least one platinum analogue . For adenocarcinoma know activate driver mutation : prior systemic therapy least TKI direct Mesothelioma progress follow least 1 3 prior systemic treatment unresectable locally advanced metastatic disease . The prior systemic chemotherapy must include pemetrexed ( antifolate ) base regimen combination platinum agent . For patient pemetrexed contraindicate tolerated approved therapy ( e.g. , peritoneal mesothelioma ) , prior therapy firstline platinumbased regimen require . Urothelial cancer arise bladder , renal pelvis , ureter urethra progress follow least 1 5 prior systemic treatment unresectable locally advanced metastatic disease ( include antiPDL1 , antiPD1 , exclude experimental therapy ) . Patients must receive least one platinumcontaining regimen ( e.g. , gemcitabine/cisplatin [ GC ] , dosedense methotrexate/vinblastine/doxorubicin/cisplatin [ DDMVAC ] , carboplatinum/gemcitabine ) .
